title: NECRI logo (Bodoni Poster and gothic sans?)
content:
Hi all; I need some help with the fonts in the attached logo.  
"New England" appears to be Bodoni Poster, squooshed.  
The next line "Court Reporting Institute" is similar to Handel Gothic, but clearly not the same.

Any ideas?

thanks,

Jason C

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130824122326im_/http:/typophile.com/files/test_4494.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [test.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130824122326/http:/typophile.com/files/test_6.jpg) | 16.66 KB |
author: jasonc

comments.content:
COURT REPORTING is probably Venus Rising.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/venus-rising/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130824122326/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/venus-rising/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/venus-rising/")

Whoever did that 'logo' maybe watched Star Wars the night before. Fits together really well don't you think?

Nick Cooke
